2.name: Sigurd
2.text: What kind of stress dream is this?

3.name: Sigurd
3.text: These are our graphics! Or at least that's what they looked like before we lost the light source.

7.text: (Wait, that's one of our NPCs, too! It's Helioliet!)

8.name: Helioliet
8.text: You! Are you the one who brought back the sun?

9.name: Sigurd
9.text: You mean fixed the light source? Yeah, I guess... I'm Sigurd.

10.name: Helioliet
10.text: You are the one! You've saved all of us!

13.name: Helioliet
13.text: It wasn't just the sun. Other things went amiss when this world was created from the abyss.

15.text: (You don't have to rub it in!)

16.name: Helioliet
16.text: I know not how you were able to save the light of the world, but could you help us with other things?

18.name: Helioliet
18.text: Thank you! You will find a number of strange things in this area.

20.text: (I've seen enough TV to know where this is going. All I need to do is bring back the logout function and I'll be able to get out.)

22.text: (But while I'm here, I should fix the rest of the game, too...)
